name: The Motorcycle
description:
A game where a motorcycle is chasing you. Based on a true story.
In this game, you need to collect five photos of you before can leave the area. Sounds easy? There is a motorcycle that will chase you, traps, stealth, low budget soundtrack and much more :)
For now there is only challenge mode and questionable story mode available, but multiplayer will be added with all maps playable (i guess) :)


  • Singleplayer
    • Story Mode
    • Challenge (Speedrun) Mode
  • Multiplayer (in Progress)
